name: Remnants of Woodhaven
description:
This game was based off of the story of a forum that is now known as http://havenstation.nogbox.com/index.php It's the grandchild of Punchwood.

Remnents of Woodhaven focuses on a combat system where characters never raise their stats. Instead they learn new skills and abilities that will help them become stronger. There are a multitude of party members you can recruit and numerous side-quests to enjoy. If you played the game let me know what you think! What did you like, what could've been better, I love getting feedback about my games.

Ready for a challenge? Try the official Hardcore Challenge! There are tons of party members is Remnants of Woodhaven, so I'll issue you this challenge, when one of them dies, never use them again. Beat the game under a Fire Emblem style perma-death rule.
